endpoints.description: Submit routing data to obtain optimized routes for a fleet of vehicles.
Retrieve the current location of a specified vehicle in real time.
Update and schedule deliveries for specific vehicles in the fleet.
Retrieve a list of all vehicles managed within the service.
Remove a specified vehicle from the managed fleet.
Report an incident or delay along a specific route for attention.
Access the historical delivery data of fleet vehicles.
Modify configuration settings for a specified vehicle in the fleet.
Retrieve analytics data about the performance of the fleet's delivery operations.
Submit user or customer feedback regarding the service or individual deliveries.
